import React , {useState , useReducer, useRef} from 'react' import './styles.css' const reducer = (state , action) =>{ } const UseReducer = () => { const initialData = 10; const [stateVariable , functionUpdate] = useState(initialData); const [state , dispatch] = useReducer(reducer , initialData); return ( <>

{stateVariable}

functionUpdate(stateVariable + 1)}> INCR
(stateVariable > 0 ? functionUpdate(stateVariable - 1) : functionUpdate(0))}> DECR
) } export default UseReducer
